sentence.Network_en: Wrap an oilcloth round the bedroll.
sentence.Network_cn: 行李卷儿外边再包一层油布.

sentence.Network_en: When traveling, a government official carried his own bedroll on his back.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府官员外出, 要自己背行李.

sentence.Network_en: He picked up his bedroll and left.
sentence.Network_cn: 他背上行李卷儿就出门了.

entry.def: A bedroll is a rolled-up sleeping bag or other form of bedding, which you can carry with you.
